document.full_text: a contentious u.s. debate over mountaintop removal coal mining is making its way to movie theaters in a documentary that its makers hope will rouse americans to action over the environmental effects of "big coal".
document.title: bobby kennedy jr. battles big coal in documentary
lines_and_colors: a contentious u.s. debate over mountaintop removal coal mining is making its way to movie theaters in a documentary that its makers hope will rouse americans to action over the environmental effects of "big coal".
